name: VIP Aircraft Turned FREIGHTER! AirX Charter Airbus A340-312 at Calgary International Airport
description:
AirX Charter is an operator that mostly specializes in VIP and luxury transportation. This particular A340 is normally outfitted in an all-business class configuration, seating up to 100 passengers. It also took the Calgary Flames to China during the 2018-2019 hockey season!

Due to the ongoing COVID-19 crisis though, this aircraft has been seen all over the globe flying much-needed PPE to impacted countries. You can see the majority of the window shades closed aft of the 2nd set of entry doors.

9H-BIG stopped in for fuel a few days before the visit seen here, flying PPE from China to Santo Domingo, Dominican Republic. It came back to Calgary a couple days later and stayed a while (as seen here), before departing to Guangzhou to take more PPE to Edmonton, Alberta.

Always nice to see an A340, especially this one helping in the fight!

With thanks to Sab for the use of his truck bed for the landing: https://www.instagram.com/sab_cortez_

FLIGHT INFORMATION
Airline: AirX Charter (AXY)
Aircraft: Airbus A340-312 (A343)
Flight Number: AXY2407/AXY2720
Livery: Standard
Engines: 4x CFMI CFM56-5C3/F 
Registration: 9H-BIG
Route: Santo Domingo (SDQ) - Calgary (YYC) - Guangzhou (CAN)
Callsign: LEGEND 2407 heavy / LEGEND 2720 heavy
Runway used: 35L / 17R
Date filmed: May 26th/29th 2020
